name: Crimson Snow (Thenutcrackerus)
description:
In 1990, a woman named Rachel receives a computer and a video game from her husband on their wedding anniversary, this is the game that she plays...
Crimson Snow is a dialogue based, story-driven psychological thriller rpg game made on RPG Maker MV. It is inspired by games like Undertale.
Set in the Medieval-Renaissance era of the 1530s, you are an angel named Phantom Scott, who after a turn of events in his childhood, vows to destroy the world he has created. It's up to you to decide which path to take for him...
Here in this game, your choices matter, so be sure to choose wisely...
Crimson Snow is aimed at a 14+ audience of individuals and for people who can handle sensitive topics, for it contains flashing/flickering imagery, crude language, mentions of abuse, murder, death scenes, violence, and suicide. Viewer discretion is advised...
